Class Balloon

java.lang.Object
  muc.drawings.Balloon
Direct Known Subclasses:
BalloonOnAString
public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object

A graphical class that displays as a balloon.

Version:
2.0 January 2, 2007
Author:
John Kirchmeyer
